import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = () => { /*one user state variable*/ const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop"); return (

shopper

    :<>}

    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
